Visualization of non-recursive CFG (DAG)

  • Each line indicates a rule.
  • ",", " ", and "=" are delimiters, and the first literal indicates the left-hand side of the rule and the rest literals are the right-hand side of the rule.
  • Rules must be indentified by numbers and left-hand side of the rule must be greater than the right-hand side.
  • The rule identified by the maximum number is the root of the CFG.
